description:
The commander of one of Colombia’s largest guerrilla organizations, the EMC, urged the government and rival group ELN to agree to a ceasefire. In a video, EMC commander “Ivan Mordisco”…

The post Colombia’s largest FARC dissident group urges ceasefire with government and ELN rebels appeared first on Colombia News | Colombia Reports.
title: Colombia’s largest FARC dissident group urges ceasefire with government and ELN rebels
